titleStmt.title: An answer to those printed papers published in March last 1640 by the late patentees of salt in their pretended defence and against free trade composed by Iohn Davies.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, Citizen and fishmonger of London.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An answer to those papers falsely intituled A true remonstrance of the state of the salt businesse.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
